snippet.title: VRsenal Arcade Cabinet feat. ILMxLAB's Vader Immortal - Lightsaber Dojo: A Star Wars VR Experience
snippet.description:
Building off the success of Vader Immortal, ILMxLAB's award-winning virtual reality series, Vader Immortal - Lightsaber Dojo: A Star Wars VR Experience is a thrilling encounter designed for the unique needs of out of home entertainment venues. Hosted on VRsenal’s proven platform, Lightsaber Dojo is a visually striking, insanely durable VR game ready to take on inexperienced and advanced players alike.

Players will wield lightsabers and blasters as they battle waves of stormtroopers, combat droids, and fearsome new enemies, ultimately facing off with Darth Vader in heart-stopping battle. Players also have the ability to use the Force to grab and throw objects, and shoot devastating lightning at enemies. With three difficulty levels and nine legendary lightsabers to choose from, Lightsaber Dojo gives players plenty of reasons to keep coming back.

VRsenal is the global exclusive manufacturer of the Lightsaber Dojo arcade cabinet. To bring the Vader Immortal - Lightsaber Dojo arcade cabinet to your venue, contact us at sales@vrsenal.com.

Visit VRsenal at: https://www.vrsenal.com
Subscribe to ILMxLAB on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/ilmxlab
